entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 11:26 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: NW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early this afternoon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
